mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review (pid, uid, content, create_date) VALUES (#{product.id}, #{user.id}, #{content}, #{createDate})
mapper.select: SELECT r.id AS 'r_id', r.content AS 'r_content', r.create_date AS 'r_createDate', p.id AS 'p_id', p.name AS 'p_name', u.id AS 'u_id', u.name AS 'u_name' FROM review AS r LEFT OUTER JOIN user AS u ON r.uid = u.id LEFT OUTER JOIN product AS p ON r.pid = p.id WHERE p.id = #{pid} ORDER BY r.create_date DESC
SELECT id, uid, pid, content, create_date AS 'createDate' FROM review WHERE pid = #{pid} ORDER BY create_date DESC LIMIT #{count} OFFSET #{start}
